title: CurrencyPal: Advanced Currency Component
description: A versatile currency system designed to seamlessly integrate into any project. With CurrencyPal, effortlessly manage in-game currencies with ease.
longDescription:
CurrencyPal is the ultimate solution for implementing robust currency systems into your projects. Engineered for flexibility and ease of use, CurrencyPal allows developers to effortlessly add and manage various in-game currencies across their projects.


At the heart of CurrencyPal is its CurrencyMaster widget, a customizable UMG element that can be seamlessly integrated into any type of UI. This widget provides players with a clear and intuitive view of their current currency holdings, and is highly customizable for any type of project.


One of the standout features of CurrencyPal is its modular design, which allows for easy customization and expansion. Developers can effortlessly create and add new currencies to their projects using data assets, enabling endless possibilities!


CurrencyPal supports both singular and interdependent (hierarchical) currencies, giving developers the flexibility to design complex economic systems tailored to their specific gameplay requirements. Whether it's gold, gems, or any other form of in-game currency, CurrencyPal simplifies the process of managing and tracking these assets, allowing developers to focus on creating engaging gameplay experiences.

technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • Component & Data Asset based
  • Easy integration and customization
  • Support for singular and interdependent (hierarchical) currencies
  • CurrencyMaster widget for intuitive currency management
  • Flexible customization options to fit the unique requirements of any project
  • Designed for performance and scalability
  • Save & load system
  • Comprehensive documentation and support for developers
  • Clean & easy-to-understand fully-commented code


Number of Blueprints:

  • 1 Actor Component
  • 5 Blueprints
  • 5 Widget Blueprints


Input: Mouse & Keyboard

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Tested on Windows but should work on other platforms as well.

Important/Additional Notes: This pack contains free icons from game-icons.net.
